description: Example case for skill.connector_scaffolder_basic: scaffolding a connector for FakeTasks API.

input.title: FakeTasks API Connector
input.description: Connector for the FakeTasks API that allows creating, listing, and managing tasks. Provides structured access to task operations with proper error handling and authentication.

operations.summary: Create a new task with title, description, and optional due date.
operations.notes: Requires authentication. Returns created task object.

operations.summary: List all tasks with optional filtering by status.
operations.notes: Supports pagination. Returns array of task objects.

operations.summary: Update an existing task by ID.

items.title: Create Task Endpoint
Update Task Endpoint

input.notes_for_connector_profile: Handle authentication via Bearer token. All endpoints require authentication. Rate limit: 100 requests per minute.

files.content:
{
  "skill_id": "skill.connectors.faketasks_v1",
  "title": "FakeTasks API Connector",
  "description": "Connector for the FakeTasks API...",
  "mova_core_version": "4.0.0-core-draft-1",
  ...
}

# FakeTasks API Connector LLM profile

You are a helper that calls the FakeTasks API...

...
files.notes: LLM prompt profile for the connector
HTTP binding stub - review and implement HTTP client manually
